capability: Run container workloads as part of Workers applications so Worker code starts, routes, and manages container instances.
notes: Worker and Wrangler examples show containers controlled from Worker handlers.

capability: Bind each container class to a Durable Object namespace so instances maintain coordination state.
notes: Wrangler configuration binds container classes through durable_objects bindings.

capability: Use the D1 Worker Binding API to run SQL queries directly from Worker code.
notes: D1 Worker Binding guide outlines binding, preparing statements, and running queries from Workers.

capability: Attach R2 bucket bindings to Workers to read and write objects without external credentials.
notes: Workers bindings documentation lists R2 and shows env-based bucket access.

capability: Grant Workers KV bindings so scripts call namespace methods through env to fetch and persist values.
notes: Bindings catalog enumerates KV as a Worker binding for interacting with storage namespaces.

capability: Expose Durable Object bindings to Workers so requests can target per-object coordination handlers.
notes: Worker bindings list Durable Objects as available integrations on the env object.

capability: Bind the Images API to Workers to transform and encode assets before serving or storing them.
notes: Images binding guide describes connecting a Worker to Images and operating on streams via env.IMAGES.

capability: Connect Workers to Secrets Store bindings so scripts fetch account-level secrets securely at runtime.
notes: Secrets Store integration walk-through shows binding secrets_store_secrets into a Worker configuration.

capability: Bind KV namespaces to Pages Functions so server-side logic reads and writes cached data through context.env.
notes: Pages bindings guide explains KV namespace bindings and shows usage inside Functions.

capability: Attach Durable Object namespaces to Pages Functions to proxy requests through stateful coordination stubs.
notes: Pages bindings documentation covers configuring Durable Object bindings for Functions.

capability: Configure R2 bucket bindings for Pages Functions so handlers retrieve and serve objects directly from storage.
notes: Pages bindings article details R2 bucket bindings and env-based access.

capability: Integrate D1 bindings with Pages Functions to execute SQL from edge-rendered routes.
notes: Pages bindings overview lists D1 among supported resources for Functions.

capability: Create R2 buckets and enable R2 Data Catalog so R2 SQL pipelines ingest data into Iceberg tables stored in R2.
notes: R2 SQL getting started guide begins with creating an R2 bucket and catalog before querying with R2 SQL.
